response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am more than willing to consider offers. Given its significance and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between the value I place on it and the substantial benefit it would offer you. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 950000}
